description:
user friendly population genomics for SNP datasets with categorical metadata.

The analysis of genomic data can be an intimidating process, particularly for researchers who are not experienced programmers. Commonly used analyses are spread out across programs, each of which require their own input formats, and data must often be.

this is for holding javascript data.
